snippet.name: 1st_derivative
snippet.equation:
dx = time - prevX dy = value - prevY prevX = time prevY = value
return dy/dx

snippet.name: 1st_order_low_pass
snippet.equation:
prevY = alpha * value + (1.-alpha) * prevY
return prevY

snippet.name: geographic_coordinates_distance
snippet.equation: r = geod.Inverse(-41.32, 174.81, $$lat$$, $$lon$$); return r.s12 // distance in meters
